TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RoutedCommand extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommand

summary.span: 定義命令，這個命令實作 和透過項目樹狀進行遞送。

span.span: Defines a command that implements and is routed through the element tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並上的方法不會包含命令的應用程式邏輯在一般情況下，但相反地，這些方法會引發周遊元素樹狀結構以尋找物件的事件.The and methods on a do not contain the application logic for the command as is the case with a typical , but rather, these methods raise events that traverse the element tree looking for an object with a . 事件處理常式附加至包含命令邏輯。The event handlers attached to the contain the command logic. 方法會引發和事件。The method raises the and events. 方法會引發和事件。The method raises the and events. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>\<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/> -或--or- \<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>\<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/> -或--or- \<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>\<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/> ## XAML 值XAML Values *predefinedClassName**predefinedClassName* 其中一個預先定義的命令類別。One of the predefined command classes. *predefinedCommandName**predefinedCommandName* 其中一個預先定義的命令。One of the predefined commands. *customClassName**customClassName* 自訂類別包含自訂的命令。A custom class which contains the custom command. 自訂類別，通常需要`xlmns`前置詞對應，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。Custom classes generally require an `xlmns` prefix mapping; see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *customCommandName**customCommandName* 自訂命令。A custom command.

summary.span: 決定是否此可以在其目前狀態中執行。

span.span: Determines whether this can execute in its current state.

returns.span: 如果命令可以執行在目前的命令目標;否則， 。

span.span: if the command can execute on the current command target; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷的實際邏輯可以執行在目前命令目標未包含在方法，而不是引發和事件通道和事件反昇到項目樹狀目錄中尋找的物件。The actual logic that determines if a can execute on the current command target is not contained in the methods, rather raises the and the events which tunnel and bubble through element tree looking for a object with a . 如果該找到，則附加至呼叫。If a for that is found, then the attached to is called. 這些處理常式提供程式設計的邏輯來判斷如果可以或不執行。These handlers supply the programming logic for determining if the can execute or not. 並上，會引發事件。The and events are raised on the . 如果上未設定，則和具有鍵盤焦點的項目上引發事件。If the is not set on the , the and events are raised on the element with keyboard focus. ## Examples 下例事件處理常式的自訂實作從。The following example is a event handler from a custom implementation of . `this.Command` 在此範例中是屬性上的。`this.Command` in this example is the property on the . 如果此命令不是`null`，此命令會轉換成。If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a . 如果命令，則方法呼叫傳遞而。If the command is a , then the method is called passing the and the . 如果命令不是，它會轉換為並方法呼叫傳遞。If command is not a , it is cast to an and the method is called passing the . 如果方法會傳回`true`，則啟用控制項; 否則控制項就是停用。If the method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disable. [!code-csharp[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/CSharp/CommandSlider.cs#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)] [!code-vb[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/visualbasic/commandslider.vb#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)]

span.span: is not a or .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CanExecuteChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於命令管理員偵測到命令來源的變更。

span.span: Occurs when changes to the command source are detected by the command manager.

summary.span: 這些變更通常會影響是否在目前命令目標上執行命令。

span.span: These changes often affect whether the command should execute on the current command target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接聽事件，會引發。The listens for the event, which is raised by the . 符合條件時，就會引發事件，可能會變更，是否應該執行的命令，例如鍵盤焦點的變更。The event is raised whenever conditions are met that may change the whether the command should execute, such as a change in keyboard focus. 此命令時收到它會引發事件，事件。When the command receives the event, it raises the event. 一般而言，命令來源將會接聽此事件和查詢藉由方法。Generally, the command source will listen for this event and query the by way of the method. 大部分的命令來源將會停用本身如果命令無法執行，其命令繫結的一部分。Most command sources will disable themselves if the command cannot be executed, as part of their command binding. 這個範例是當變成灰色，本身時，無法執行命令。An example of this is when a grays itself out when the command cannot be executed. 在某些情況下，不會察覺有條件的變更會改變要執行命令的能力。In some situations, the is unaware of a change in conditions that alters the ability of a command to execute. 在這些情況下，您可以強制引發要藉由呼叫的事件方法，這會進而導致引發事件。In these cases, you can force the to raises the event by calling the method, this will in turn cause the to raise the event. ## Examples 下例事件處理常式的自訂實作從。The following example is a event handler from a custom implementation of . `this.Command` 在此範例中是屬性上的。`this.Command` in this example is the property on the . 如果此命令不是`null`，此命令會轉換成。If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a . 如果命令，則方法呼叫傳遞而。If the command is a , then the method is called passing the and the . 如果命令不是，它會轉換為並方法呼叫傳遞。If command is not a , it is cast to an and the method is called passing the . 如果方法會傳回`true`，然後啟用控制項; 否則會停用控制項。If the method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disabled. [!code-csharp[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/CSharp/CommandSlider.cs#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)] [!code-vb[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/visualbasic/commandslider.vb#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)]

[!code-csharp[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandExecute](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/CSharp/CommandSlider.cs#implementicommandexecute)] [!code-vb[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandExecute](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/visualbasic/commandslider.vb#implementicommandexecute)]
